root.query: Select ACCOUNT_ID, SSN, STATUS, TYPE, DATEOPENED, DATECLOSED From ACCOUNT
Select SSN, FIRSTNAME, LASTNAME, ST_ADDRESS, APT_NUMBER, CITY, STATE, ZIPCODE, PHONE From CUSTOMER
Select TRANSACTION_ID, ACCOUNT_ID, PRODUCT_ID, PURCHASE_DATE, SHARES_COUNT From HOLDINGS
Select ID, SYMBOL, COMPANY_NAME From PRODUCT
